description: “We weren’t meeting in secret and we certainly weren’t plotting the destruction” of America, said Lloyd Blankfein, reacting to comments from Donald Trump.
title: Goldman Sachs C.E.O. on Trump
title_page: Goldman Sachs C.E.O. on Trump - Video - NYTimes.com
text: “We weren’t meeting in secret and we certainly weren’t plotting the destruction” of America, said Lloyd Blankfein, reacting to comments from Donald Trump.
